Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations, offering unparalleled value and functionality. Given its exceptional quality, it's worth $15000 to you, but I'm considering your unique position and am willing to offer it to you at a special price. My proposal is to extend this opportunity to you for $12000. This offer not only provides you with significant savings but also ensures that you're acquiring an item that meets your highest standards. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
